resources.string:
In order to import your confidential data to a secured (encrypted) passwallet you need to create a xml file with you preferred xml editor or just generate an empty one using the "Create empty not encrypted passwallet" link. The plain passwallet xml file structure is at below:
 <USERSACCOUNTS>
 	<userAccount>
 		<description>description_1508524059202</description>
 		<id>1</id>
 		<name>name_1508524059202</name>
 		<nickName>nickname_1508524059202</nickName>
 		<password>pass_1508524059202</password>
 		<siteURL>siteurl_1508524059202</siteURL>
 	</userAccount>
 ... </USERSACCOUNTS>
